name: vue-wordpress-plugin
description: A starting point for using VueJS in WordPress plugins. This is designed to be hacked and changed.

scripts.build-js: NODE_ENV=production browserify -g envify -t vueify -e js/script.js -o js/build.js -t [ babelify --presets [ es2015 ] ]
scripts.watch-js: NODE_ENV=production watchify -g envify -t vueify -e js/script.js -o js/build.js -t [ babelify --presets [ es2015 ] ]
scripts.build-js-dev: NODE_ENV=development browserify -g envify -t vueify -e js/script.js -o js/build.js -t [ babelify --presets [ es2015 ] ]
scripts.watch-js-dev: NODE_ENV=development watchify -g envify -t vueify -e js/script.js -o js/build.js -t [ babelify --presets [ es2015 ] ]
